articles.title: “Unusually Massive” – Astronomers Discover a Planet That Shouldn't Exist - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Researchers at Penn State have discovered an unusually massive planet, LHS 3154b, orbiting an ultracool dwarf star. This finding, contradicting current theories, prompts a reassessment of star and planet formation processes. The discovery of a planet that is …
articles.content: Penn State researchers have discovered an extraordinarily massive planet orbiting an ultracool dwarf star, challenging existing theories of planet and star formation. Named LHS 3154b, the planet’s ma… [+8374 chars]

articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: 2200-foot asteroid, 4 other space rocks to pass Earth; NASA shows how close they will get - HT Tech
articles.description: As many as 5 asteroids are set to pass Earth by close margins in the next few days, NASA has revealed. One asteroid is a colossal 2200-foot asteroid! Know their speed, size, distance of approach, and more as per NASA.
